Package managers

Class CurrencyManager

java.lang.Object
managers.CurrencyManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Publisher
public class CurrencyManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Publisher
Class that handles operations tied with currencies.
Since:
22.06.2020.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private DatabaseManager databaseManager
    enables indirect communication with the database
    static int NOT_CHARACTER
    indicates that currency abbreviation contains numbers

    indicates that balance amount is not a number
    static int NUM_CHARACTERS
    indicates that currency abbreviation to be added doesn't consist of 3 characters
    private java.util.List<Observer> observers
    list of observers
    static int OK
    indicates that adding the currency was successful
    static int WRONG
    indicates that adding the currency failed

  • Method Details

    • addCurrency

      public int addCurrency​(java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String balance)
      Function that adds new currency. notifyObservers() is called after currency is successfully added.
      Parameters:
      currency - String : currency abbreviation
      balance - String : string representation of the currency's balance
      Returns:
      number which indicates which message will be displayed.

    • countCurrencies

      public int countCurrencies() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Function that counts how many currencies are there.
      Returns:
      number of currencies
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if counting doesn't go like intended
